content: christmas star ornament by patty kubitzki hook size g 4 5mm yarn caron one pound big twist or similar worsted wt 4 yarn about 0 5 oz size 4 75 across abbreviations and terms beg = beginning blo = back loop only chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet half_double_crochet = half treble_crochet repeat = repeat round = round single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch space = space treble_crochet = treble_crochet yo = yarn over half_double_crochet yo 2 times pull up a loop in working st yo pull thru 2 yo pull thru 3 don t turn on rnds beg and round 1 chain 3 slip_stitch in 1st chain at the beg chain 3 in the center ring work double_crochet chain 1 9 times slip_stitch join into the chain space at beg round 2 * in space work puff st yo pull thru 4 times yo and pull thru all chain 2 repeat from * in each of the 10 chain sps slip_stitch to top of 1st puff st round 3 * single_crochet in next chain 2 space chain 1 in next chain 2 half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet treble_crochet chain 3 treble_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet chain 1 repeat from * ending with chain 1 slip_stitch join in blo to beg single_crochet round 4 slip_stitch blo around fasten_off weave in ends tie is about 11 knot the ends and attach with loop in middle to high point find all my links at https //about me/pattykubitzki
